desc: Summer is on its way, dont miss out we have an amazing selection of seeds! You can choose from 12 different flavors that are guaranteed to Xseed your expectations! Xseedz has also decided to spice up your summer with some of our new flavors: Balsamic Vinger, Cinnamon Roll, and Loaded Potato

layout.text: Introducing our New Chile & Lime Pepita Pumpkin Seeds !
